channel.title: B.B.Q short film aka better be quick
channel.description: Hey guys this is my first short film i got to direct please check it out vote and share hope you guys enjoy http://www.rodemic.com/myrodereel/watch/336

item.title: B.B.Q short film aka better be quick
item.dc:creator: @JUMPHIM JUMPHIM
item.description:
@JUMPHIM wrote:

Well guys it looks like I’m doing pretty good I’m in the top 30s. That not bad at all. If you can please go vote!! The heart on the left is were you vote thank you moparions for taking the time and helping one of your own out. let me know If i can do the same for you.

Read full topic
item.source: B.B.Q short film aka better be quick

item.title: B.B.Q short film aka better be quick
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

It was good, nice camera work, only things that let it down are the poor audio quality, particularly when they’re outside, and the quality/resolution of the special effects, including the bits at the end with the splash screens

Read full topic
item.source: B.B.Q short film aka better be quick

item.title: B.B.Q short film aka better be quick
item.dc:creator: @JUMPHIM JUMPHIM
item.description:
@JUMPHIM wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:4, topic:543016”]Well… The people acting weren’t exactly the best. The person on the grill didn’t even seem like he was old enough to drink lol. He also seemed pretty unfamiliar with those tongs. He flipped the food so awkwardly lol. The first scene where the guy opens the window and the (what I presume) meteor hits, there wasn’t enough glass in the guy. He was directly in front of the window, and it exploded inwards toward him. And all he suffers is some cuts and 1 small piece of glass in him? Not likely.
The acting was pretty poor (no offence) overall. But the camerawork was pretty great.[/quote]

I agree with you 100 percent bro my editor wouldn’t listen to me. that’s why i’m learning how to edit on my own my next short will be bad ass. me personally i would of cut the beginning and fixed that crap explosion scenes.

Read full topic
item.source: B.B.Q short film aka better be quick

item.title: B.B.Q short film aka better be quick
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Well… The people acting weren’t exactly the best. The person on the grill didn’t even seem like he was old enough to drink lol. He also seemed pretty unfamiliar with those tongs. He flipped the food so awkwardly lol. The first scene where the guy opens the window and the (what I presume) meteor hits, there wasn’t enough glass in the guy. He was directly in front of the window, and it exploded inwards toward him. And all he suffers is some cuts and 1 small piece of glass in him? Not likely.
The acting was pretty poor (no offence) overall. But the camerawork was pretty great.

Read full topic
item.source: B.B.Q short film aka better be quick

item.title: B.B.Q short film aka better be quick
item.dc:creator: @JUMPHIM JUMPHIM
item.description:
@JUMPHIM wrote:

TabbyKiller:

Well I’ll give you props for having friends who participate in this sort of stuff. I’d be doing the same things if my mates weren’t totally camera shy.

dude just try to DO little to know dialog and you will be fine, it was alot of fun and this is just the beginning!!! come on mopar i put years in to you so can you please take a few seconds to vote love you all.
